search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Textlocal (textlocal.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Textlocal is available at [https://www.textlocal.com/pricing/](https://www.textlocal.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Text SMS Prices - Industry Leading Platform & Price Match Guarantee

extracted_content.content:
Webex Interact - Textlocal
===============

[![Image 1](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/tl-logo.svg)](https://textlocal.com/) [![Image 2](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/interact-logo.jpg)](https://webexinteract.com/?utm_source=CPC&utm_medium=Google&utm_campaign=G.ads-tl-uk-brand-textlocal/)

The next generation of Textlocal is here!
=========================================

Introducing Webex Interact, our new easy-to-use messaging platform that provides businesses with the tools they need to easily send campaigns across multiple channels, like SMS and WhatsApp.

[SIGN UP TO WEBEX INTERACT](https://app.webexinteract.com/signup) [LOGIN TO MESSENGER](https://control.txtlocal.co.uk/)

[![Image 3](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/tl-logo.svg)](https://textlocal.com/) [![Image 4](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/interact-logo.jpg)](https://webexinteract.com/?utm_source=CPC&utm_medium=Google&utm_campaign=G.ads-tl-uk-brand-textlocal/)

![Image 5](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/interact-demo-img.webp)

Already a Textlocal customer?
-----------------------------

As part of our ongoing commitment to providing you with the best communication tools, we have launched our new Messaging solution, Webex Interact. Webex Interact is the new version of our Messenger platform, where you can benefit from exciting new channels and tools to make the most of your campaigns.

**This means that we are no longer taking new signups on Textlocal Messenger from April 2025.** Existing customers will receive communications regarding their account and how they can upgrade to Webex Interact.

Existing customers can continue using the Messenger platform as normal until they're invited to complete their free upgrade.

If you have any questions or need support, contact us [here](https://textlocal.com/support/contactus/)

Login to Textlocal Messenger here
---------------------------------

[LOGIN](https://control.txtlocal.co.uk/)

Want to know more about Webex Interact?
---------------------------------------

Webex Interact has been built on the trusted legacy of Textlocal, leveraging years of experience in the mobile messaging industry. Webex Interact offers many of the great SMS features from Textlocal Messenger, and now includes WhatsApp as a channel to enhance your business communications.

We are continuously adding new and exciting features to the platform, making Webex Interact the one platform for all your business messaging needs.

If you'd like to know more, we have a series of YouTube videos and tutorials to help you get started, you can watch them [here](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2k7rgXmrhUZbxfA1kaq2tBUKFHPbm3dM).

![Image 6](https://textlocal.com/wp-content/themes/textlocal/images/landing-pages/interact-ui-merge-fields-sms-1x1.webp)

Visit Webex Interact here
-------------------------

[FIND OUT MORE](https://webexinteract.com/)

FAQs
----

*   ### **Can I upgrade my account to Webex Interact?**
    
    All existing customers will be invited to upgrade or contacted by the Textlocal team before August 2025.
    
*   ### **What will happen to my Textlocal Messenger account?**
    
    If you do not upgrade your Textlocal Messenger account within the timeframe specified in the invite, your account will be closed. Your data will be stored as per our [Data Privacy Policy](https://textlocal.com/legal/privacy-statement/). If you do upgrade, we will continue to hold your Textlocal Messenger data for 90 days.
    
*   ### **What will happen to my pre-paid credits?**
    
    Should you choose to upgrade, your existing Messenger credits will be migrated to Webex Interact. During the upgrade process you will be given an overview of the equivalent credit value based on your balance. This is the value that will be available to use in Webex Interact. Any unused credits remaining in your Textlocal Messenger account after August 2025 will expire and no refunds will be given.
    
*   ### **Can I speak to someone about my account?**
    
    If you are an existing customer, you can reach out to your account manager for support. If you need to contact us, you can submit this form [here](https://textlocal.com/support/contactus/).
    

Copyright © 2005 - 2025 Txtlocal Ltd

*   [Privacy Statement](https://textlocal.com/legal/privacy-statement/)
*   |
*   [Terms & Conditions](https://textlocal.com/legal/terms-and-conditions/)
*   |
*   [Copyright](https://textlocal.com/legal/copyright/)
*   |
*   [Acceptable Use](https://textlocal.com/legal/acceptable-use/)
*   |
*   [Cookies](https://textlocal.com/pricing/?tlrx=MPX%20-%20Bing%20-%20Targeting%20-%20Generics%20-%20Core%20-%20Send%20SMS%20(Exact)#privacy-manager)
*   |
*   [Status](https://status.textlocal.com/)

 

    

By continuing to use our website, you acknowledge the use of cookies.

[Privacy Statement](https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/about/legal/privacy-full.html) Change Settings

![Image 8: Company Logo](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/03fc55fe-0057-4b2f-817d-763e7ecdb316/a7f4c642-c43c-4666-acea-858c0449029c/cisco-logo-transparent.png)

Consent Manager
---------------

Your opt out preference signal is honored.

*   ### Your Privacy
    
*   ### Strictly Necessary Cookies
    
*   ### Performance Cookies
    
*   ### Targeting Cookies
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
*   ### Social Media Cookies
    

#### Your Privacy

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. From the list on left, please choose whether this site may use Performance and/or Targeting Cookies. By selecting Strictly Necessary Cookies only, you are requesting Cisco not to sell or share your personal data. Note, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on the site and the services we are able to offer.

#### Strictly Necessary Cookies

Always Active

These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms.    You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

#### Vendor List

#### OneTrust

Always Active

##### Parent Company

###### OneTrust

##### Default Description

###### OneTrust LLC (OneTrust) is a provider of privacy management software platform. The company's platform supports organizations to adhere compliance with the data privacy, governance and security regulations across sectors and jurisdictions.

#### Performance Cookies

 Performance Cookies

These cookies provide metrics related to the performance and usability of our site. They are primarily focused on gathering information about how you interact with our site, including: page load times, response times, error messages, and allowing a replay of a visitor’s interactions with our site, which enables us to review and analyze visitor behavior, helping to improve site usability and functionality. These cookies also allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site and will not be able to monitor its performance.

#### Vendor List

#### Twitter

##### Parent Company

###### Twitter Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Twitter is an American microblogging and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as "tweets". Registered users can post, like, and retweet tweets, but unregistered users can only read those that are publicly available.

#### Adobe Audience Manager

##### Parent Company

###### Adobe

##### Default Description

###### Adobe Audience Manager is Adobe's best-in-class data management platform.

#### CloudFlare

##### Parent Company

###### Cloudflare Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Cloudflare’s global cloud platform delivers a range of network services to businesses of all sizes around the world—making them more secure while enhancing the performance and reliability of their critical Internet properties.

#### Google Analytics

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic, currently as a platform inside the Google Marketing Platform brand.

#### ShareThis

##### Parent Company

###### ShareThis

##### Default Description

###### ShareThis transforms user-level behavioral data to better understand, validate, and expand consumer behavior for targeting and activation, customer acquisition, and insights and analytics.

#### Hotjar

##### Parent Company

###### Hotjar Ltd

##### Default Description

###### Hotjar is an intuitive, visual way to discover, consolidate, and communicate user needs, and provides product experience insights that show how users behave and what they feel strongly about.

#### TrustPilot

##### Parent Company

###### Trustpilot, Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Trustpilot is a leading online collaboration platform.

#### Adobe Dynamic Tag Manager

##### Parent Company

###### Adobe

##### Default Description

###### Adobe Dynamic Tag Management (DTM) lets marketers quickly and easily manage tags and provides innovative tools for collecting and distributing data across digital marketing systems.

#### Targeting Cookies

 Targeting Cookies

These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites.    They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

#### Vendor List

#### Microsoft Bing Advertising

##### Parent Company

###### Microsoft

##### Default Description

###### Microsoft is a software corporation that develops, manufactures, licenses, supports, and sells a range of software products and services.

#### AppNexus

##### Parent Company

###### Xandr Inc. (AT&T)

##### Default Description

###### A business unit within AT&T, Xandr powers a global marketplace for premium advertising.

#### AdRoll

##### Parent Company

###### NextRoll, Inc.

##### Default Description

###### The AdRoll Growth Marketing Platform includes email marketing, AI-driven product recommendations, and cross-channel measurement.

#### DoubleClick

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### DoubleClick Digital Marketing (DDM) is an integrated ad technology platform owned by Google that enables advertisers to create and manage digital marketing campaigns.

#### Taboola

##### Parent Company

###### Taboola

##### Default Description

###### Taboola is the world's leading discovery and native advertising platform that helps people explore what's interesting and new in the moment of next.

#### Google AdSense

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### Google AdSense is a program run by Google through which website publishers in the Google Network of content sites serve text, images, video, or interactive media advertisements that are targeted to the site content and audience.

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly.

#### Vendor List

#### Cisco Systems

##### Parent Company

###### Cisco Systems, Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Cisco's hardware, software, and service offerings are used to create the Internet solutions that make networks possible.

#### YouTube

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### YouTube is an American online video sharing and social media platform owned by Google.

#### Pardot

##### Parent Company

###### Salesforce.com, inc.

##### Default Description

###### Pardot is B2B Marketing Automation by Salesforce that allows marketing and sales teams to create, deploy, and manage online marketing campaigns that increase revenue and maximize efficiency.

#### Gstatic

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### Gstatic.com is a Web domain owned and used by Google for accessing the Gstatic server: a server where Google hosts its static content like CSS, images or JavaScript.

#### Typekit (now Adobe Fonts)

##### Parent Company

###### Adobe

##### Default Description

###### Adobe Fonts is an online service that provides its subscribers with access to its font library, under a single licensing agreement. The fonts may be used directly on websites, or synced via Adobe Creative Cloud to applications on the subscriber's computers.

#### jsDelivr

##### Parent Company

###### Prospect One

##### Default Description

###### jsDelivr is a public, open-source CDN (Content Delivery Network) focused on performance, reliability, and security. It is free to use for everyone, with no bandwidth limits.

#### Tealium

##### Parent Company

###### Tealium Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Tealium sells enterprise tag management, an API hub, a customer data platform with machine learning, and data management products, allowing their customers to connect their data so they can connect with customers.

#### Google Photos

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### Google Photos is a photo sharing and storage service developed by Google.

#### Google

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### For apps or sites, user-generated content is content that users contribute toward any app or site, visible to at least a subset of other users. User-generated content can include text, comments, images, video, profiles, usernames, votes, likes, hearts, or other media, for example.

#### Gravatar

##### Parent Company

###### Automattic Inc.

##### Default Description

###### A Gravatar is a Globally Recognized Avatar. You upload an image and create your public profile just once, and then when you participate in any Gravatar-enabled site, your Gravatar image and public profile will automatically follow you there.

#### BootstrapCDN

##### Parent Company

###### jsDelivr

##### Default Description

###### BootstrapCDN is a public content delivery network.

#### ReCaptcha

##### Parent Company

###### Google

##### Default Description

###### reCAPTCHA uses an advanced risk analysis engine and adaptive challenges to keep malicious software from engaging in abusive activities on your website.

#### Social Media Cookies

 Social Media Cookies

These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit.    If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.

#### Vendor List

#### Facebook

##### Parent Company

###### Meta Platforms, Inc.

##### Default Description

###### Facebook is an online social media and social networking service owned by Meta Platforms.

### Cookie List

 Switch Label label

 Switch Label label

 Switch Label label

Clear

 checkbox label label

Apply Cancel

Save Settings

Allow All

[![Image 9: Powered by Onetrust](https://cdn.cookielaw.org/logos/static/powered_by_logo.svg)](https://www.onetrust.com/products/cookie-consent/)

![Image 10](https://t.co/i/adsct?bci=3&dv=UTC%26en-US%26Google%20Inc.%26Linux%20x86_64%26255%26800%26600%264%2624%26800%26600%260%26na&eci=2&event_id=4be52ae7-88c2-4707-a764-f5f2432a9fcf&events=%5B%5B%22pageview%22%2C%7B%7D%5D%5D&integration=advertiser&p_id=Twitter&p_user_id=0&pl_id=c11721da-e483-481a-9fb8-0319b9f4beda&tw_document_href=https%3A%2F%2Ftextlocal.com%2Fwebex-interact%2F&tw_iframe_status=0&tw_order_quantity=0&tw_sale_amount=0&txn_id=nvrs8&type=javascript&version=2.3.31)![Image 11](https://analytics.twitter.com/i/adsct?bci=3&dv=UTC%26en-US%26Google%20Inc.%26Linux%20x86_64%26255%26800%26600%264%2624%26800%26600%260%26na&eci=2&event_id=4be52ae7-88c2-4707-a764-f5f2432a9fcf&events=%5B%5B%22pageview%22%2C%7B%7D%5D%5D&integration=advertiser&p_id=Twitter&p_user_id=0&pl_id=c11721da-e483-481a-9fb8-0319b9f4beda&tw_document_href=https%3A%2F%2Ftextlocal.com%2Fwebex-interact%2F&tw_iframe_status=0&tw_order_quantity=0&tw_sale_amount=0&txn_id=nvrs8&type=javascript&version=2.3.31)

![Image 12](https://bat.bing.com/action/0?ti=199002309&tm=gtm002&Ver=2&mid=bd3a8f5e-2c8c-4485-9c47-bed45f6748ee&bo=1&sid=9b6b443019ce11f0859d43c1e2ef1449&vid=9b6baaa019ce11f0bbb69575f53ce4e7&vids=1&msclkid=N&pi=918639831&lg=en-US&sw=800&sh=600&sc=24&tl=Webex%20Interact%20-%20Textlocal&p=https%3A%2F%2Ftextlocal.com%2Fwebex-interact%2F&r=&lt=1924&evt=pageLoad&sv=1&cdb=AQET&rn=715966)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Textlocal is transitioning to Webex Interact, and existing customers will be migrated with their credits.

###### jsDelivr is a public, open-source CDN (Content Delivery Network) focused on performance, reliability, and security. It is free to use for everyone, with no bandwidth limits.

###### For apps or sites, user-generated content is content that users contribute toward any app or site, visible to at least a subset of other users. User-generated content can include text, comments, images, video, profiles, usernames, votes, likes, hearts, or other media, for example.

###### A Gravatar is a Globally Recognized Avatar. You upload an image and create your public profile just once, and then when you participate in any Gravatar-enabled site, your Gravatar image and public profile will automatically follow you there.

#### Social Media Cookies

 Social Media Cookies

These cookies are set by a range of social media services that we have added to the site to enable you to share our content with your friends and networks. They are capable of tracking your browser across other sites and building up a profile of your interests. This may impact the content and messages you see on other websites you visit.    If you do not allow these cookies you may not be able to use or see these sharing tools.
